name: Romeo Adventure
description:
This is my fifth game, and the third game with Romeo the orange and white cat. It originally was the original project of Romeo Adventure, and I decided to make it in TIC-80. It uses the same engine as Romeo in Pico Adventure, but it has better resolution (thanks to the TIC-80 which has it better than PICO-8), and I added cutscenes too.

In Romeo Adventure, you control Romeo with the arrows keys, explore a great forest, and you have to avoid some evil strange creatures.

I wish you a very good game with Romeo in this adventure.
